p: A relatively new technique in the micropropagation of both rare and many other plants is biotization of endophytic microorganisms. This technology is designed to stimulate growth, development, reduce stress, and increase plant immunity in vitro by introducing bacteria and fungi into cultures [ 118]. New studies have revealed a positive effect of many microorganisms on the growth of the vegetative part of plants, seed maturation, resistance to pathogens, callus growth, and increased tolerance to low temperature [ 119].
